name: taskterm
description: taskterm is a terminal-based manager app that allows you to manage your tasks directly from the command line. it provides a simple, efficient, and fast way to manage your tasks.

scripts.build: tsc && echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' | cat - dist/taskManager.js > temp && mv temp dist/taskManager.js && chmod +x dist/taskManager.js
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run patch
